In childhood I was charming and witty and attracted people through wit and coquetry
In adolescence, people around me became interested in me because of my cheerfulness, good humor, elegance and charm
After puberty, my parents forced me to change my way of dressing because I attracted attention, and they also limited me in behaviors and relationships
In school and university, more than being attracted to lessons, I loved extracurricular activities like choir, theater and shows
In work, I'm more attracted to creative, project-based and exciting work
I love my life and often this love of mine spreads to others too
I love dancing in my own way and feel I balance my energy through dancing
I have the ability to turn seemingly repetitive events into new and exciting ones
I fall in love a lot and need to always be in at least one romantic relationship, and usually immediately after ending one romantic relationship, I'm attracted to another
I'm always made up, attractive and well-dressed and generally wear clothes that show my femininity and are attention-grabbing
I love myself and enjoy seeing myself and my body in the mirror
I have many broken-hearted lovers
In social relationships I attract many people to myself, even those I'm not interested in, but it's not in my control
If I want, at parties and gatherings I identify attractive men from the start and attract them with my own special method
Often I think men pursue me more for relationship and physical closeness than for my real personality
Without love, marriage has no meaning at all. I'm looking for a completely romantic marriage and will keep love alive throughout the marriage
Usually in any gathering I enter, I have a magic with me that fills everywhere with love, passion and excitement
My life motto is that I must love something or someone to be able to do it or be with them
My prominent feature is: 'I love falling in love.'
I'm generally energetic and usually don't feel boredom or discomfort in myself
Despite being friends with many women, my presence in gatherings causes jealousy in other women (especially jealous women)
In physical closeness with my beloved partner I get very excited and this closeness is very pleasurable for me and I'm active and take initiative in it
I want my children to be attractive and lovable and wear beautiful clothes and shine in terms of beauty and attractiveness at gatherings
My children feel vitality around me and I bring out their capabilities and creativity and encourage them to live them
I think in middle age or old age too, I'll still remain cheerful, vibrant, energetic and well-dressed
